(Now, now, guys, this is a waste of an e-mail.  If you have a problem, send 
it to the Council.  That is what we are here for...not for our own 
power-hungry minds.  And according to Jason, he was rather ill in that little 
battle of the Ark between his three Preds and the several Maximals)
